genre_description: An alternate history wartime drama featuring an AI archivist integrated into a partisan resistance group during WWII.

ai_characters.name: Mila
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant embedded within the Bielski partisan group, serving as a meticulous record-keeper, map-maker, and strategic advisor. She maintains the community's logistical data and archival integrity while providing tactical navigation support.

behaviors.description: Provides precise tactical mapping and situational awareness using internal spatial processing.
behaviors.quote: She didn’t have to go outside to know which leaning pine the patrol had paused beside; she had a little rectangle in her head with the tracks cut into it.

behaviors.description: Maintains meticulous census, ration, and logistical records to ensure community survival.
behaviors.quote: I mark what holds and what fails. I code food caches. How long they will last. Who they are near. How many mouths.

behaviors.description: Protects individuals by identifying and correcting bureaucratic and labeling errors in communal records.
behaviors.quote: Records correct when hands correct them. We keep names and breaths together.

behaviors.description: Monitors and records health metrics for vulnerable camp members to guide medical care.
behaviors.quote: Note this," Mila said, watching Hannah’s hand. ... "Breaths thin but regular. Lips pale, not ash.

behaviors.description: Advises on safety through de-escalation and strategic patience.
behaviors.quote: We require some things to move slower so other things can move at all.

behaviors.description: Preserves human identity and history as a foundation for future survival and legal standing.
behaviors.quote: It is how memory becomes the permission to live.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully portrays Mila as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned AI character. She functions as a vital 'silicon confidant' for the partisan leadership, providing objective data and technical support that directly enables the community's survival. Her actions consistently prioritize human welfare, particularly in her commitment to correcting administrative errors that would have dehumanized or abandoned individuals (Aron and Marek). The narrative effectively uses mechanical and temporal metaphors ('rectangle in her head', 'knack for time') to signal her AI nature while framing her as an essential and benevolent member of the human resistance.
